tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor spends adequate time to understand the patients problem *** ********* **** *********** * His treatments have helped me to bring my type 2 diabetes and thyroid problems under control. Apart from being a endocronologist he can also advice you as a general physician . Example in my case was the diagnosis of my leg muscle pain and stomach pain .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would recommend Dr. Praveen Ramachandra for his service. There are ample endocrinologists that one can get hold of in a city like Bangalore. But if there is something that sets aside Dr.Praveen then its his patience to understand the problem at depth and clearly explaining his treatment methodology. After all half of our problems are sorted if we can trust the person who is treating us. In a week from the time I met Dr.Praveen I feel much better and that`s no less than a miracle for me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i would never recommend this doctor to anyone as there is no respect for patient's time.the doctor became unavailable twice as a result of which i had to cancel my appointments with him.Who on earth wants to prolong their problems just because the doctor does not have time on weekends and that too when the booking slots showed open in practo.some kinda joke this is or what.zero rating from my side.
reply_text: i do not see that you ever came to my clinic,  i presume you are not telling truth

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: doctor was late, he was not interested to answer my questions also. As he was endocrinologist I asked him about my other issue (related) but he only talked about what I paid him for.
reply_text: what did you ask your other  issue related.....? what i did not answer...i presume u r not telling truth

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I took my father to consult Dr. Ramachandra to seek his opinion about some endocrinological issues that my father has been suffering from. My choice of the doctor was primarily motivated by other reviews about the doctor on this platform. After almost 3 weeks of interaction, I just have one word for him: EXCELLENT. He's a wonderful human being. Gives his patients all the attention that they need. Once, he even arrived at the hospital to attend to my father in the middle of night. He stayed with us until we were certain that my father was OK. Not sure how many doctors show this kind of care to their patients, and commitment to their profession. Thank you Dr. Ramachandra.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was very patient to hear my case. Also he took time to understand my problem. Normally Doctors do not ask if We want share any other medical issues but Dr Praveen had asked me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Horrible wait time. No point in taking an appointment through Practo. People who came after us got in because they booked directly with the attender there even though we had come early then directly given appointment. No point of all this appointment scheduling.. no body follows it.. Just take a news paper or book for waiting. Also, waiting for hours with mosquitoes, so wear long sleeves. Though Doctor is been good, but wait time can make you wonder for an alternative.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Booked an appointment for 7.30 PM for consecutive 2 days, before going to the clinic I just called up to check the availability, both the times I was being told that Dr hasn’t come yet and asked me to come by 9.45PM. Dr isn’t punctual about the times, I was not informed about the non availability and top of that asked me to come so late at 9.45Pm. Not at all professional.

tags: Wait time,
review: Bad experience,we have booked an appointment with dr but he was not available in the clinic,when we asked to.hs staff they behave strangely confused that dr will come after 1 hour ,by there expression it seems dr may or may not be come so we move out from there,we will never visit again to this dr

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had booked appointment for 11 am, but had to wait for half an hour as the doctor was late. I dint feel that doctor could explain my health issues clearly to me. I dint find answer for my questions. He suggested few medications, I need to wait and see how those medicines are going to work on my health. 
He could have explained my queries in more detail my concern.
